docs.summary: The wix-configs-backend module contains functionality for working with user-configured data in Velo package code.
description: > This module is intended for use when building Velo packaged in [Wix Blocks](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-the-app-builder).

params.name: key
params.doc: The key value that's paired with the desired data in the `config.json` file.

docs.summary: Retrieves the value of a specific key in the package's `config.json` file.
